p: The distillation study was conducted using 250 g of dried lavender flowers. Freshly harvested parts of plants were immediately subjected to steam distillation for 2 h to extract the essential oil. The lavender oil (LO-SM) was separated from the hydrolate, dried with anhydrous sodium sulphate, and stored in an amber bottle at +4 Â°C in a refrigerator until time of analysis.
